name: Riddle of the Sphinx: An Egyptian Adventure in Real-time 3D
blurb: Explore secret chambers. Discover hidden tombs. And unravel an ancient Riddle entombed by the ancient Egyptians, in real-time 3D!

rewards.reward: Dig Site Assistant\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nA huge THANK YOU for helping us meet our goal. You're helping to support indie developers and the adventure game genre.

Get Episode 1 (of 4) of Riddle 3D\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nGet a full version of Episode 1 of Riddle of the Sphinx 3D 15th Anniversary Edition in real-time 3D. You're pledge helps us reach the initial goal of funding Episode 1, featuring full exploration of the Sphinx, Giza Plateau, Gil's Tent, historical areas in the Great Pyramid, plus a portion of hidden chambers. Because Riddle is such a colossal game, each episode is fairly large. Remaining chapters may be purchased in game without losing progress. (digital)

Get the Game, Solve the Riddle!\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nYou get to explore all four episodes of Riddle of the Sphinx 15th Anniversary Edition in real-time 3D as it was meant to be played and viewed, plus you will receive updates along the way. You will be listed in the Backers credits. Your support goes toward meeting the full-funding stretch goal. Most importantly, you have the satisfaction of helping Riddle of the Sphinx get into the hands of a new generation.

+ Riddle 3D Soundtrack & Interactive Hint Guide\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nIn addition to all previous rewards, you get the digitally-enhanced Riddle 3D soundtrack performed by Jeff Tobler, with exclusive never-released tracks. As an added bonus, you will receive free access to the expanded interactive edition (in-game) of Book of the Dead Ends walkthrough and solutions guide. (digital)

+ Digital ROTS Art Book\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nIn addition to all previous rewards, you'll receive a limited-edition art book featuring hi-res images of the most compelling scenes from Riddle of the Sphinx, along with design sketches, notes, and other information never revealed. (digital)

+ 15th Anniversary Boxed Edition & Poster\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nIn addition to all previous rewards, you will receive a beautiful special-edition boxed version of Riddle of the Sphinx real-time 3D in celebration of it's 15th anniversary. The box will be pure eye-candy! You'll be listed in the "Dig Site Backers" credits in the game and on the official website. (physical)

+ Riddle HD "Hands-On" Survival Pack (Soundtrack, Hint Guide, & T-Shirt) & Credits\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nIn addition to all previous rewards, you get the official Riddle HD Soundtrack on CD with exclusive bonus tracks mentioned in reward #3, an anniversary printed edition of "Book of the Dead-Ends" Hint Guide, and a special-edition T-Shirt. The Book of the Deads strategy guide features a detailed walkthrough with screenshots, descriptions, behind-the-scenes commentary, historical insights, and more. What's unique about this walkthrough section is that we offer clues and hints without spoiling the puzzle. Eventually, the solution is revealed, if need be. Plus, this hint guide offers a "quick-guide" at the back of the book, for those who want the solutions quickly without having to think their way through the game. You'll be listed in the "Rare Finds Backers" credits in the game and on the official website. (physical)

+ Limited-Edition 3D Printed Relic\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nIn addition to all previous rewards, get your hands on the first ever limited-edition 3D printed sculpture of some of the most compelling objects from Riddle of the Sphinx, including the Sphinx and Pharaoh's Knife. Plus, your name will be in the "Treasure-Hunters Backer" credits in the game. (physical)

+ Signed, Limited-Edition ART-ifact Art Book\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nIn addition to all previous rewards, get your hands on the first ever limited-edition art book featuring hi-res images of the most compelling scenes from Riddle of the Sphinx, along with design sketches, notes, and other information never revealed. Plus, your name will be in the "Expedition Backer" credits in the game. (physical)

+ Limited-Edition Rare ART-ifact Framed Print & Credits\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nIn addition to all previous rewards, you get a professionally framed, matted, autographed limited-edition Art Print of one of the many beautiful scenes in Riddle (this is much higher quality than the poster), produced by a nationally recognized gallery print lab. You will be able to choose between 3 options: a framed, matted art print, a canvas gallery wrap (UV laminated), or a striking wall-mount revolutionary metal print. Plus, your name will be in the "Rare ART-ifact Backer" credits in the game and on the official website. (physical)

+ Become a Pyramid Builder\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nIn addition to all previous rewards, help us design an artifact or item that will be featured in the new 3D edition of Riddle of the Sphinx. Your item will be seen by multitudes playing the game. Plus, your name will be in the "Builders Backer" credits in the game and on the official website. (physical)

+ Hide Yourself in the Pyramid (Cameo)\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nIn addition to all previous rewards, if you're not the artist-type, send us a photo of yourself (some restrictions apply) and we'll put you in the pyramid as a personal Easter egg that only you know how to solve. We could even superimpose your face on the Sphinx! If you want to publish the secret to your puzzle, everyone could see your cameo. Plus, your name will be in the "Cameo Backer" credits in the game and on the official website. (physical)

+ Riddle of the Sphinx 3D Libraries - Master Builder Collection\r\n-------------------------------------------\r\nIn addition to previous rewards at the $350 tier, get our treasure trove of the beautiful and organic shapes and textures used to create the original Riddle of the Sphinx, including the Giza Sphinx - optimized and ready for Strata's 3D software - Strata Design 3D CX. You get the Sphinx, the coffers, vases, artifacts, Gil's items, and more. You'll see how we modeled and mapped the objects, plus you'll have an extensive library at your fingertips to start designing your very own adventure. As a BONUS, you will receive an exclusive gift (an amazing offer), apart the Kickstarter Campaign, for everyone who receives the full collection of shapes and textures (details are on our website http://lifetreegames.com/3d-libs-offer). Most importantly, you'll have an opportunity to design an (appropriate) 3d item for use in Riddle of the Sphinx's additional scenes. And if that isn't enough, we're also going to send you exclusive hi-res renderings of ROTS' most striking scenes. (physical + digital)

+ Meet the Builders & Sneak Peak at Next Adventure...
-------------------------------------------
In addition to previous rewards, for your über generous support of Riddle of the Sphinx 3D (which will definitely help spark our next new game), you will receive a featured listing in credits under “Elite Backer”. 

This is an exclusive opportunity to visit with the developers for a day at their 40 acre horse ranch and development studio loft, plus enjoy lunch with the team at a world-class restaurant nearby. Best of all, you will have an exclusive opportunity to preview a few scenes from the next adventure in the works. (physical)
